javadoc: A special header for GhidraTables to handle things like tooltips and hover information.

methods.name: getDraggedColumn
methods.comment:
Overridden to fix a 'bug' in Java whereby it tries to render columns that we have just
 removed when editing the visible columns.

return.comment: the column being dragged by the user
